effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. All of the target’s stat modifiers are reset to zero.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. All of the target’s stat modifiers are reset to zero.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. All of the target’s stat modifiers are reset to zero.

short_effect.sun_moon: Removes all of the target’s stat modifiers.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Removes all of the target’s stat modifiers.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Removes all of the target’s stat modifiers.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user attacks by throwing a clump of special mud. All stat changes are returned to normal.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user attacks by throwing a clump of special mud. All stat changes are returned to normal.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user attacks by throwing a clump of special mud. All stat changes are returned to normal.
